choices: You have no idea what you turned into.
1.content:
You start working on your project in studying what certain animal traits are. "Damn, this job is boring" you mumble to yourself. You really couldn't find any other job out there; this was the only job available at the time.

You sigh for a bit while actually not paying attention to what your doing. You hear loud bubbling and hissing "um, whoops" you say as you see the flask start to bubble and glow. *BOOOOOM!* you wake up from the freak explosion 5 minutes later.

"I really got to be more careful next time" you say greatfully to yourself. you shake yourself out of the daze you went through and slowly walk back to the table you were just at but not before passing by a big mirror first. You look into it and freak out.
1.title: Let the transformation begin!

11.content: You begin to panic as you see yourself almost naked and covered with scales, but what kind of reptile did you become?
11.title: You turned into something scaly!

choices: Yes, but you also have standard dragon forearms.
1111.title: One other question...

choices: You head towards a fast food joint.
You head towards the nearest restaurant.
You head towards the nearest cheese factory.
You head towards the nearest ice cream parlor.
12.content:
As you transformed into something impossibly huge and hairy in this case Disney's own Mickey mouse.

"Oh no i'm a vicious impossibly huge monster version of Mickey Mouse." you say looking at the big mirror in front of you. Then a vicious evil thought came to mind as you grinned evilly.

"Now that i'm a vicious impossibly huge monster version of Mickey Mouse, i feel like devouring as much food as possible and to that i say it's dinner time!" You bellow out loud as you proceed to heavily stomp towards one of the laboratory's walls, leaving a hole in it as you proceed to stomp towards the city itself.
12.title: You turned into something hairy!

choices: Try to talk to the police.
124.content:
As you stomp to the nearest ice cream parlor, everyone around you screams, terrified. Oh no! You seem to have forgotten that you are a monster version of Mickey Mouse. Soom, you hear the wailing sirens in the distance.

Great!

You think sarcastically, letting out a frustrated moan. What should you do next?
124.title: You head towards the nearest ice cream parlor.

choices: your legs turned into an amorphous blob, your body becames a round jelly (boy)
your entire body is a round jelly living being (boy)
your feet and boobs expand, but you also got  massive pair of balls (both)
your arms melt from your shoulders, but your legs remain intact (girl)
Your boobs, ass and feet grow 11 times their original sizes (girl)
13.content: Your body turns into a slimy jello flavored substance. You feel that your skin becomes gel, making it more sensitive. Your hair also becomes gel.... but what else do you notice?
13.title: are you a boy or a girl.

Blue gives you no bonuses.
Purple makes you smarter, but also makes your fetishes stronger

14.content: You were covered in feathers! You had become...
14.title: The bird-beast of (insert town name here).

141.content: What sort of bird were you?
141.title: Tweet-tweet, sucka!

144.content: You were now a fusion of bird and centaur. What sort of bird were you?
144.title: Man, this just got weird.

15.content: What did you turn into?
15.title: You have no idea what you turned into.

choices: growing fur, big muscles, a musclegut and claws that come from your fingers
turning green and your natural feminine figure gets stronger
154.content: You were transformed into a mutant super person. You noticed that you were noticeably taller. You inspect the mirror closely to see if there were any subtle changes that you missed. You then look into the mirror in shock as you start...
154.title: A mutant super person

choices: Dr. Klemine decides to use you as a lab rat or lab bear in your case
Dr. Klemine decides to use you as a superhero
1541.content:
You then look into the mirror in shock as you start growing fur, big muscles, a musclegut and claws that come from your fingers. As the back fur grows on your body your face takes on a more bearlike appearance. When the transformation stops you resemble an anthropomorphized bear, but it is clear that your still human. You try taking in the shock of the sudden transformation. You feel stronger and faster than 500,000 bears and judging by your glowing eyes you could probably shoot lasers out of your eyes. You then test that theory by concentrating on the mirror.

To your surprise a laser bean comes out of your eyes and bounces across the entire room. You look on in shock as the beam bounces around the room and stops after one minute. Just as you were wondering about the ruin lab equipment you find yourself floating in midair. You begin panicking as you discover your powers of flight. Clearly besides the obvious physical transformation you obviously has some superpowers and super strength wouldn't be a bad guess judging that your muscles grew larger and for some strange reason you developed a huge muscle gut.

"This is just creepy." You said in a noticeably deeper voice. "What will my coworkers think when they see the monster I have become? I'm some kind of mutant freak of nature who looks like a bear."

You begin sobbing, unaware that it caused the glass to shatter. Normally you wouldn't cry, but the added testosterone is causing you to have an emotional breakdown. You then hear voices from down the hall.

"What is that noise Dr. Klemine?"

"I don't know but we must find out." Dr. Klemine replied as she fixed her glasses.

Upon discovering you...
1541.title: The Incredible Grizzlyman

155.content: What di you turn into?
155.title: Other

15531.content: Which Random Body Part Do u become?
15531.title: Random Body Part(Butt,Hand,Foot,Etc)

info.brief_description: You transform into a monster from a lab experiment gone wrong.
info.description:
You were doing a test on defferent types of creatures when a freak accident made you transform into a vicious monster.

Hairy, Scaly, Slimy, anything goes except sex and extreme gore (ex: Guts splattering everywhere, heads blowing up) vore IS one of the things i will allow. Terror and screaming maybe. Have fun.

If you seen The Were Experiment(http://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/1836768-The-Were-Experiment) it's like that one except you do the transformation to yourself.
